title: How is the Yamaha P125 digital piano as an option to buy a digital piano? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yamaha P125 is an excellent choice if you’re planning to buy a digital piano. It has a lot to offer for the price. The Yamaha P125B Digital Piano is a weighted action digital piano that comes with a Sustain Pedal, X-Style Keyboard Stand, Power Supply, and Padded X-Style Piano Bench. The P125B is a portable keyboard that comes with over half a thousand magnificent instrumentals, voices and styles. It is made up of 88 touch-sensitive black and white keys, aboard lessons, and slots for a PC and mobile device connections. For more information you can check out our website or call us on 8080809455. Link: Yamaha P125B Digital Piano
